Field synchronization confirmation promp: Are you sure you want to synchronize fields from database? Depends on the number of tables and fields, This operation may take anywhere from a few seconds to several dozen seconds. If you only need to sync specific tables, please use the "Configure Fields" - "Sync from database" for those tables.
